DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to develop a questionnaire to measure patient expectations of breast-conserving therapy (breast-conserving surgery and radiation). This questionnaire will assist both surgeons and patients by helping provide valuable information to patients about what to expect during and after surgery.
DOC.brief_title: Developing a New Questionnaire About Patient Expectations of Breast Conserving Therapy
DOC.criteria: Female Age 1875 Patients who are scheduled to undergo lumpectomy at MSKCC as part of breast conserving therapy for invasive breast cancer OR who have completed BCT (lumpectomy and radiation) at least 6 months prior to recruitment Inability to speak or understand English Inability to provide meaningful informed consent due to physical, cognitive, or psychiatric disability Patients undergoing lumpectomy without radiation
